title: Axita Cotton  Standalone December 2025 Net Sales at Rs 89.40 crore, down 60.8% Y-o-Y
author: Broker Research
content:
Reported Standalone quarterly numbers for Axita Cotton are:Net Sales at Rs 89.40 crore in December 2025 down 60.8% from Rs. 228.04 crore in December 2024. Quarterly Net Profit at Rs. 2.60 crore in December 2025 up 312.7% from Rs. 1.22 crore in December 2024. EBITDA stands at Rs. 5.12 crore in December 2025 up 366.67% from Rs. 1.92 crore in December 2024. Axita Cotton EPS has increased to Rs. 0.07 in December 2025 from Rs. 0.03 in December 2024. Axita Cotton shares closed at 9.31 on January 09, 2026 (NSE) and has given 3.44% returns over the last 6 months and -10.22% over the last 12 months.
